title: Systems Analysis and Development
description: Degree in Systems Analysis and Development, with a focus on building and maintaining web applications. Education centered on fullstack development, with a strong foundation in programming logic, system modeling, and software quality practices. Knowledge of agile methodologies, information security, and integration with cloud services such as AWS.

title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
description: Graduated with honors, specializing in software development and data analysis. Completed a capstone project on machine learning algorithms for predictive analytics.
